group_1.narration: One bone-chilling Halloween night...@A demon girl appeared in a small@village with her cow and wolf minions.
They attacked the villagers with@Magic Artifacts that drained life energy.@It was then, a lone knight appeared...
But the knight also became a victim@of the demon's mysterious powers@and failed to save the village.
That was when she appeared.@The Magical Girl born of Halloween...@Magical Karin.
She will be the one to save the day!
Staff@Momoko Togame, Rena Minami, Kaede Akino
I still don’t have my wolf...@But this should be enough to get started!
The name of the play will be...@Magical Halloween Theater!

group_1.textRight: It's good that you thought of a name for@the show, but what do we do from here?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:101201:lipSynch_1]Uh... Rehearse?

group_1.textRight: There's still a lot of other things to do.

group_1.textLeft: Oh right, I have to find someone to play the@wolf!

group_1.textRight: There's also costumes, sound effects,@lighting. You'll need stage staff, too.
You should also make a schedule for@everything leading up to the show itself.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, um... I... Uh...

group_1.textRight: I guess I don't have a choice... I suppose@I'll make the schedule.
There we go, this should work.

group_1.textLeft: Ohhh, that's amazing!
With this I can tell exactly what needs to be@done!

group_1.textRight: It's nothing special.
I just considered everything in reverse,@starting from the show date.
So, from here on—

group_1.textLeft: You can handle the schedule!

group_1.textRight: Huh?

group_1.textLeft: I'm not really good with organizing stuff...
That's why I'm gonna leave it to you!
Plus, I have to go find a wolf for the play,@so could you please take care of this?
Well, all right... If that's how you want to@do it, Karin...

group_1.textRight: Let's just give it a try then.

group_1.textLeft: Okay.
Ugh, this sucks! This cardboard is way too@thick to cut!

group_1.textCenter: Rena! You're holdin' the box cutter upside@down!

group_1.textLeft: What?

group_1.textCenter: Besides, I already told you, you're holdin'@it at the wrong angle.

group_1.textRight: [chara:101101:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]♪♪♪ ♪♪♪ ♪♪♪ ♪♪♪

group_1.textCenter: Kaede, you're so good with your hands.

group_1.textLeft: She's probably just used to it because@she does so much gardening at home.
Don't mix soil with the paint, okay?

group_1.textRight: Why would I do that?!

group_1.textLeft: O-ohhh, my life force... It's being@drained...

group_1.textRight: Moo moo moooooo! We're gonna suck up all@your life force!

group_1.textLeft: Now. Prepare yourself. How will you survive@this, Knight?

group_1.textRight: Pfffthaha!!!
Yachiyo, come on, take this seriously.@Kidding around at a time like this!

group_1.textLeft: ...I wasn't kidding around. I'm being@completely serious.

group_1.textRight: You're reading your lines like a robot.

group_1.textLeft: Huh, I... Am I really?
Ahem...
Now. Prepare yourself! How will you survive@this, Knight?

group_1.textRight: Pfffthaha!!! Aha, ahahaha... @Oh, my stomach's starting to hurt...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100201:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]...

group_1.textRight: Hmmm. How about we change things up a bit?

group_1.textLeft: We still have time until the show, but we@can't afford to get lazy...
Let's put the acting aside for now.
First let's just drill the script over and@over until we know it by heart.

group_1.textRight: Me and Iroha will find some more people that@can help!

group_1.textLeft: Ah, yes. We need people to man the stage.
Now that you mention it, Asuka did say she'd@help if it's backstage work...

group_1.textRight: Oh, awesome!
(A wolf... I need a wolf...)

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100201:lipSynch_0][chara:100201:cheek_-1][chara:100201:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:100201:lipSynch_1]*Sigh*
What?
What's going on? What are you doing?

group_1.textRight: I'm looking for my last actor.

group_1.textLeft: Who's directing your rehearsals?

group_1.textRight: Everyone's just doing that on their own...

group_1.textLeft: Who's in charge of the schedule?

group_1.textRight: Yachiyo is.

group_1.textLeft: Geeze... What are you doing then?

group_1.textRight: I'm looking for my last actor.

group_1.textLeft: Huh...
These are my designs for the cow and wolf.

group_1.textRight: Oh, thank you!
Huh? What? Why...?
Why did you do that?!

group_1.textLeft: Just who is the producer of this show?@Who started it, and who is it for?
I have no desire to work for an idiot who@can't even understand that...
Thanks to you, the mood in this classroom@has spoiled...
Goodbye!

group_1.textRight: (Why?)
(I don't get it...)
